lines.text: To make a whole lot of ash, which he could blow in Slick's face to blind him.
To throw off his aim! With the gun!
The gunshot rang out <c=#FF00FF>before</c> the fire alarm went off.
Meanin' it was still gettin' bigger and smokier by the time the wizard got shot.
There wouldn't have been a big pile of ash to use- it'd be a big pile of fire.
Hm... I'm not so sure about the timing of the <c=#FF6000>Go Wizard's</c> death, but okay. Something else.
